column5: 2-0   , now back to Ottawa ......whooooohooo  playing good hockey   sabers      go sens go

Great - 2 down and 6 to go.  Go Sens and Canada. We are also in the World finals.  Thanks for the score Muskymatt - I started to go thru the TV channels and radio to get the score. I do not watch sports except for "The New Flyfisher".  GO SENS GO

Hey Matt, it really does look like they FINALLY have become a team with confidence.  When Buffalo scored that tying goal with 5 sec. left, I thought there was no way they would win and would fold like a cheap tent but after watching the highlights they really seemed composed and not worried.  And on another note, have you been out yet?  I havent been able to get out because of vehicle issues but I am heading up to Crotch lake for the May long weekend and finally will be out.  We should get out some time again and this time I will be ready when that rod goes off with a ski on.

The scary part is that they seem to be getting better every single game out.  The sad thing about this is we may only have 6 hockey games  left.  No way Detroit or even Anaheim can even come close to putting up a fight.  Go Sens Go
